LanguageData.VEF.Factions.Contraband_Booze_GiftWarnin: Gifting {ILLEGALTHING_label} is against {FACTION_name} law. This may or may not affect your relations with them in the future
LanguageData.VEF.Factions.Contraband_Booze_GiftIllega: Gifting {ILLEGALTHING_label} to {ILLEGALFACTION_name} is against {FACTION_name} law. This may or may not affect your relations with them in the future
LanguageData.VEF.Factions.Contraband_Booze_SellWarnin: Selling {ILLEGALTHING_label} is against {FACTION_name} law. This may or may not affect your relations with them in the future
LanguageData.VEF.Factions.Contraband_Booze_SellIllega: Selling {ILLEGALTHING_label} to {ILLEGALFACTION_name} is against {FACTION_name} law. This may or may not affect your relations with them in the future
LanguageData.VEF.Factions.Contraband_Booze_LetterDesc: {FACTION_name} caught wind that you have been gifting {ILLEGALTHING_label} behind their back. They consider it to be against the law, and your relations have degraded
